attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
free gillian gibbons. cant are goverment protect us at all are they scared. its discracefull this women goes to jail. they do what they want both here and there. when will it end. please lets get together  and put and end to this extreamisum before its too late.
its was a teddy bear. god knows what will be next. 




please free gillain who has done nothing wrong. lets be positive about our beliefs too. we also have a right or not? if we are going to get along this is not the way. you need to take a hold before its too late.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
